text:
The javadoc of `AccessLogVavle#setRotatable` could be polished, it looks like this:

"Set the value is we should we rotate the logs"
creator: stephane.nicoll@gmail.com
chris@christopherschultz.net
text: Would you care to supply a patch for this? It should be easy, plus you can get your name into the changelog :)

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
I went ahead and fixed this as I plan to tag the next set of releases shortly.

Fixed in:
- trunk for 9.0.0.M12 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.7 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.39
- 7.0.x for 7.0.73 onwards
- 6.0.x for 6.0.48
